channel.title: Suddenly sprinting everywhere?
channel.description:
So I decided to come back to this game to try and get some of the achievements I missed or didn't quite meet the requirements for in my first run, and now that I've gotten the HEV suit, I'm constantly moving at spinting speed? Every time I push forward ('w' in my case) it plays the little jet noise it usually does when you sprint and I'm going sprint speed. I tried saving and reloading the game entirely, but it's still happening.
Only workshop add-ons I've got going are one that tweaks something in the suit's voice intro, which really shouldn't affect this, and a thing to make the blood spatter on viewmodels look better, so I've no idea what's causing it. Any ideas? This is really distracting, and I'd hate to have to put the game back down because of it.
After a little experimenting, I've come to realize it's only the forward button that does it. Even when I switch to the arrow keys, it's the exact same thing. Was this how it was before? Am I going crazy?
(Cross-posting from Steam discussion forums )
EDIT: Decided to try reloading a save from an older run and the problem still persisted, so this clearly isn't specific to any one location. It [i]only[/i] started after I got the HEV suit.

Well I’m dumb. Still, why on Earth did that suddenly get turned on? It certainly wasn’t on last time I played. Perhaps make it so that isn’t the default, or whatever caused it to just get flipped on without my knowledge.
